com.nus.cool.core.cohort.birthselect

Class BirthSelection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nus.cool.core.cohort.birthselect.BirthSelection

  • public class BirthSelection
extends java.lang.Object
    This class shows how to choose the birthAction according to cohort query.

      • getUserBirthEventDate

        public java.time.LocalDateTime getUserBirthEventDate(java.lang.String userId)
        If user's birthEvent is selected, Get the birthEvent's Date. If cohort query requires a collection of event we take the first event in whole collection as user's birthEvent
        Parameters:
        userId - userId
        Returns:
        LocalDateTime

        public boolean selectEvent(java.lang.String userId,
                           java.time.LocalDateTime date,
                           ProjectedTuple tuple)
        Select input Action Tuple, if it can not be selected as event return false Else return true and add this event into BirthSelectionContext for further check.
        Parameters:
        userId - userId
        date - actionTime
        tuple - Partial Action Tuple,
        Returns:
        true or false
